metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Long Time Ago - Dynasty Warriors 4 is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Long Time Ago - Dynasty Warriors 4 has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor, D Dorian,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
